column4: write it into your xorg.conf as Option "HorizScrollDelta" "0".....
yah... I tried that.  But gnome wouldn't start.  It just sat there.
hmmm, it seems it was dying on the following:
you need one option line for every option
those are valid params too, if you do synclient -l
really strange. mail the author, he was very responsive when i mailed him
